data.text: You find an odd scrap of chitin or shell or something on one of the rats you just defeated. It sticks out as odd due to a pattern of lines and curves on one side which, when rotated correctly, almost seems to resemble a map. Of this very tunnel, in fact.

As best you can tell, it indicates there's a cave entrance towards the end of the tracks furthest from the transit center, hidden behind a few natural obstructions. You could go there now, if you wanted, but you have to wonder if you'll find anything beyond just lots more rats.
